description: First Lady Michelle Obama's plan to make Americans healthier isn't stopping at school lunch; she now wants the military to shape up as well. Greeks are striking again today to protest deep cuts the government wants to make in order to get more bailout money. The unemployment rate dropped last month to 8.3 percent, but some economists say the news isn't as good as it sounds. And big drinks companies are fighting in what some might call "whiskey wars."
byline: Gregory Warner, Sam Beard, Chris Farrell, John Dimsdale, David Brancaccio, David Gura, Jeremy Hobson, Christopher Werth and Mary Dooe
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, February 10, 2012
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, February 10, 2012
